events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-03-31 involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
After initial review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to involvement of the insured vehicle in a collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to begin further communication and support for the auto accident claim.
Acknowledgment of claim receipt was sent to the customer, assuring prompt handling of the auto accident settlement process.
The insurance company requested the accident report, repair estimates, and photos of the damaged car for claim verification.
Customer provided all required documents including police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair shop estimates.
Investigation has commenced to assess the claim details, damage validity, and liability of the parties involved.
The investigation affirmed the claimant’s account, confirming responsibility and extent of vehicle damage after the accident.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair costs and policy coverage limits for the auto accident damages.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and timely processing of the accident claim.
The insurance provider approved the claim following customer agreement on the settlement for the vehicle repairs.
Payment was processed and sent to the customer’s repair shop to cover all approved costs for the auto repair.
The claim was formally closed after payment confirmation and positive confirmation from the customer on repair completion.
All claim files and communications were archived as the case was successfully resolved and closed without any pending issues.
